“Pants on the ground, pants on the ground, lookin’ like a fool with your pants on the ground” ~General Larry Platt #lol #lyrics #quote
“Any form of art is a form of power; it has impact, it can affect change it can not only move us, it makes us move” ~Ossie Davis #art #quote
“The bartender says to René Descartes, ‘Another beer?’ and Descartes says, ‘I think not,’ and disappears.” ~Alfred ‘Alfie’ Bester #GQ #quote

“A single rose can be my garden, a single friend, my world.” ~Leonardo ‘Leo’ Buscaglia #GQ #friendship #quote

“It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.” ~Edmund Hillary #GQ #achievement #quote
“There’s no reason to be the richest man in the cemetery. You can’t do any business from there.” ~Harlan ‘Colonel’ Sanders #wealth #quote
@LifeisaRatRace Right back at you! The follow and the listing are both much appreciated :)
@melaniedaigle Yes Melanie, I agree. So, a big thank you for your kind RT :)
“Quotation is the highest compliment you can pay to an author.” ~Samuel Johnson #GQ #quotes #quote
@kuishando Hi Hendry, welcome aboard and thank you for your kind words :)
“The painter should not paint what he sees, but what will be seen.” ~Paul Klee #GQ #vision #quote
“Only two classes of books are of universal appeal. The very best and the very worst.” ~Ford Madox Ford #GQ #books #quote
“We must travel in the direction of our fear.” ~John Berryman #quote
“Wear the old coat and buy the new book.” ~Austin Phelps #quote
“We all live under the same sky, but we don’t all have the same horizon.” ~Konrad Adenauer #quote
“Writing is a socially acceptable form of schizophrenia.” ~E. L. Doctorow #quote
“Poetry is plucking at the heartstrings, and making music with them.” ~Dennis Gabor #quote
“Nothing from man’s hands, no law, nor constitution, can be final. Truth alone is final.” ~Charles Sumner #quote
“Life is like an onion: you peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.” ~Carl Sandburg #quote
“The only man who makes no mistakes is the man who never does anything.” ~Theodore Roosevelt #quote
“Reading music is like listening to flowers. I don’t understand the concept.” ~Paul Westerberg #quote #MusicMonday
“The superior man blames himself. The inferior man blames others.” ~Donald ‘Don’ Shula #quote
“Think like a man of action, act like a man of thought.” ~Henri Bergson #quote
“Humor is the instinct for taking pain playfully.” ~Max Eastman #quote
“Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.” ~J. R. R. Tolkien #quote
Ask me anything, and I might even answer ;) http://www.formspring.me/GoodQuotes
“There is no education in the second kick of a mule.” ~Ernest Hollings #quote
“Try to look at everything through the eyes of a child.” ~Ruth Draper #quote
“There is no distance on this earth as far away as yesterday.” ~Robert Nathan #quote
“Nothing in life is to be feared. It is only to be understood.” ~Marie Curie #quote
“There is no limit to what a man can do so long as he does not care a straw who gets the credit for it” ~Charles Edward Montague #quote
“There are always flowers for those who want to see them.” ~Henri Matisse #quote
@RadiantSuang Thank *you* :)
“The art of progress is to preserve order amid change and to preserve change amid order.” ~Alfred North Whitehead #quote
@just1heather Why, thank you ma’am, I appreciate that a lot :)
@only1one Cheers bro, I’m with you :)
“…aaah, there is hope to guide me, I will survive, living in a world without you” ~The Rasmus #MusicMonday
“Aaah, there’s a world without you, I see the light, living in a world without you…” ~The Rasmus #mm
“…suddenly naked I run through your garden, right through the gates of the past and I’m finally free…” ~The Rasmus #mm
“You put me together, then trashed me, for pleasure, you used me, again and again, abused me, confused me…” ~The Rasmus #mm
“…suddenly someone will stare in the window, looking outside at the sky that had never been blue…” ~The Rasmus #mm
“…you told me, my darling, without me, you’re nothing, you taught me, to look in your eyes, and fed me, your sweet lies…” ~The Rasmus #mm
“Something inside me called freedom came alive, living in a world without you…” ~The Rasmus #MusicMonday
“Jazz tickles your muscles, symphonies stretch your soul.” ~Paul Whiteman #quote #MusicMonday
@Jenntrick Thank you Jenn! <3 :)
“The universe is full of magical things, patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.” ~Eden Phillpotts #quote
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “Better understated than overstated. Let people be surprised that it was more than you promised and easier than you ...
“What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us—what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.” ~Albert Pike
“No man succeeds without a good woman behind him. Wife or mother. If it is both, he is twice blessed indeed.” ~Harold Macmillan #quote
“Adults are always asking little kids what they want to be when they grow up because they’re looking for ideas.” ~Paula Poundstone #quote

“Never does the human soul appear so strong as when it foregoes revenge and dares to forgive an injury.” ~Edwin Hubbell Chapin #quote
“Justice delayed is justice denied.” ~William Ewart Gladstone #quote
“I would rather be poor in a cottage full of books than a king without the desire to read.” ~Thomas Babington Macaulay #quote
“You’re the best thing I never knew I needed, see now it’s so clear I need you here” ~Ne-Yo #MusicMonday
“You’re the best thing I never knew I needed, so when you walked in I had no idea” ~Ne-Yo #MusicMonday
“Wisdom is knowing what to do next, skill is knowing how to do it, and virtue is doing it.” ~David Starr Jordan #quote
Goood morning! Make today beautiful :) <3
@just1heather Thank you! Inspired by The Reality™ ;)
“Life is a great big canvas, and you should throw all the paint you can on it.” ~Danny Kaye #quote
“One of the hardest things in life is having words in your heart that you can’t utter.” ~James Earl Jones #quote
@misschanto Aww Jenny … <3 :)
@Jenntrick And it’s the truth :)
Beauty is all around, don’t make yourself too busy to notice it! <3
@Nessagirly Nessa <3 :)
“When a deep injury is done us, we never recover until we forgive.” ~Alan Paton #quote
“He that dares not grasp the thorn should never crave the rose.” ~Anne Brontë #quote
“The people and circumstances around me do not make me what I am, they reveal who I am.” ~Laura Schlessinger #quote
@IloveTwilightBR That’s very kind of you, thank you :)

@IloveTwilightBR Great to see you again :)

“Don’t be afraid to take a big step if one is indicated. You can’t cross a chasm in two small jumps.” ~David Lloyd George #quote
Good morning, beauties! Have an awesome Tuesday :)
“I believe in a thing called love, just listen to the rhythm of my heart” ~The Darkness #MusicMonday
“Om du var min, om du var min, du skulle aldrig sakna någonting, du skulle få precis vad du vill, om du var min…” ~Mauro Scocco #MusicMonday
@misschanto Oh really? Yay, glad I was able to provide :)
@Jenntrick Hope you had an awesome Monday :)
“I can’t feel the ground, someone let me down, I’ve never felt so high as I do now, it’s too good to be true…” ~Ne-Yo #MusicMonday
“Often the test of courage is not to die but to live.” ~Vittorio Alfieri #quote
“Truth is like the sun. You can shut it out for a time, but it ain’t goin’ away.” ~Elvis Aaron Presley #quote
@just1heather Aww, sleep well :)
